column5:
I watched every single movie of this dreadful franchise just to rank them
my hate for Alien Resurrection knows no words

Sadly, this isnâ€™t what we got, and what we got has a LONG list of tiny and severe shortcomings, so that I have to objectively say this isnâ€™t a good film. But boy what it could have been.
